Title: Relates to exempting certain income from temporary work related to improving participation in the decennial census in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs
Summary: Exempts certain income from temporary work related to improving participation in the decennial census in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-n, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting certain income from temporary work related to improving participation in the decennial census in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs
